MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the FK7 postcode area of Sauchieburn. This is causing flickering lights, intermittent supply and low voltage to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:37pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:26pm on Saturday, 26 December 2020
